```{r}
# custom function to transpose while preserving names
transpose_df <- function(df) {
  t_df <- data.table::transpose(df)
  colnames(t_df) <- rownames(df)
  rownames(t_df) <- colnames(df)
  t_df <- t_df %>%
    tibble::rownames_to_column(.data = .) %>%
    tibble::as_tibble(.)
  return(t_df)
}
```
